verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: intends] [ARG1: to meet one - on - one briefly with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un at the beginning of their June 12 summit -- a moment the president has said will be a critical gauge of whether a deal is likely] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a U.S. official familiar with their plans] .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] intends to [V: meet] [ARG1: one - on - one] [ARGM-TMP: briefly] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: at the beginning of their June 12 summit] -- [ARGM-ADV: a moment the president has said will be a critical gauge of whether a deal is likely] , according to a U.S. official familiar with their plans .

Donald Trump intends to meet one - on - one briefly with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un at the beginning of their June 12 summit -- a moment the president [V: has] said will be a critical gauge of whether a deal is likely , according to a U.S. official familiar with their plans .
